Class GUITile

  • java.lang.Object
    • danaus.GUITile

  • public class GUITile
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance is a graphical representation of a tile on the map.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
        int s,
        int x,
        int y)
        Draw this tile on the map, using g, at topleft corner (x, y). The tile side length is s.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics to paint with.
        s - The side length of the tile.
        x - The x coordinate of the top left of the tile.
        y - The y coordinate of the top left of the tile.
